verses.roman:
ei mata kīrtana kari' nagare bhramilā
bhramite bhramite sabhe kājī-dvāre gelā

synonyms: ei mata—in this way; kīrtana—congregational chanting; kari'-executing; nagare—in the city; bhramilā—circumambulated; bhramite bhramite—while thus moving; sabhe—all of them; kājī-dvāre—at the door of the Kazi; gelā—reached.
translation: Peforming kīrtana in this way, circumambulating through every nook and corner of the city, they finilly reached the door of the Kazi.
